definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point

sentences.english: Storage for ten months in shady room and dry place.
sentences.chinese: 贮于室内阴凉处，贮存期十个月。

sentences.english: You should sit in the shade for a while.
sentences.chinese: 你应该在阴凉处坐一会。

sentences.english: Fruit ripens not well in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 阴凉处的果子不会成熟。
我们必须把饭篮放在阴凉处。

sentences.english: Take two capsules B. i. d. daily as a dietary supplement. Store in a cool, dry place.
sentences.chinese: 每次二粒，一天二次，存放于阴凉处。

sentences.english: Silver storage cap should be tightened, placed< 15 ℃ interior cool place.
sentences.chinese: 银浆的存放应拧紧瓶盖，置于＜15℃室内阴凉处。

sentences.english: I put the plants in the shad in order that the sun won't burn them.
sentences.chinese: 我把这些植物放在阴凉处以便太阳晒不到它们。

sentences.english: You'd better camp under the shade, which will help during the heat of the day.
sentences.chinese: 你最好在阴凉处设营，白天天气炎热时就能遮荫了。

sentences.english: Store the bottle of medicine in the shade.
The Vila Vita Vital Spa puts Sloane Street salons firmly in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 维拉维塔的生命置于阴凉处温泉斯隆街沙龙坚决。

sentences.english: Stored in a cool and dry place for other time use.
sentences.chinese: 存放于干燥阴凉处晾干，以备下次使用。

sentences.english: Stored in a cool and dry place for next time use.
sentences.chinese: 存放于干燥阴凉处晾干，以备下次使用。

sentences.english: Store honey in a cool, dark place in an air-tight container.
sentences.chinese: 蜂蜜要用密封容器包装，存放于阴凉处。

sentences.english: Then lie down on a flat surface and place a cool, damp cloth over your forehead.
sentences.chinese: 然后平躺在阴凉处，在前额上放置凉毛巾。

definition: (of the sun) to scorch/to expose to a scorching sun
to dry in the air/(fig.) to cold-shoulder
to lay sth out to dry
